transArray.content: This hotel is invincible in cost performance, and the location is excellent. The airport line is just downstairs to the airport. There are self-service laundry facilities, the room is very smart, there are some recreational facilities such as billiards on the first floor, and the key point is to provide free supper wontons, which is very suitable for young people. There is also a small bar at the door where you can order a glass of beer.
